entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Shamattawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023
